metadata.title: CVE-2023-4583 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When checking if the Browsing Context had been discarded in`HttpBaseChannel`, if the load group was not available then it was assumedto have already been discarded which was not always the case for privatechannels after the private session had ended. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 117, Firefox ESR < 115.2, and Thunderbird < 115.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
